archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Verify Service Configuration
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Process Context This process element represents part of the overall enterprise, modeled in business process terms, and can be applied (ie â€œinstantiated") with other similar process elements for application within a specific organization or domain. Brief Description This process verifies whether the service configuration matches the appropriate product features.
